javadoc:
Class to hold meta information about a plugin, derived from meta-data attached to
 each {@link Plugin} using a {@link PluginInfo @PluginInfo} annotation.

methods.name: getPluginDescription
methods.comment:
Fetches the PluginDescription for the specified Plugin class.
 
 If the PluginDescription is found in the static cache, it is returned directly,
 otherwise a new instance is created (using annotation data attached to the Plugin
 class) and it is cached for later use.

methods.javadoc:
Returns true if this plugin requires a noticeable amount of time to load when installed.
@return
methods.name: isSlowInstallation
methods.comment: Returns true if this plugin requires a noticeable amount of time to load when installed.

methods.javadoc:
Set the short description for what the plugin does.
@return short description
methods.name: getShortDescription
methods.comment: Set the short description for what the plugin does.

methods.javadoc:
Get the location for the source file for the plugin.
@return path to the source file
methods.name: getSourceLocation
methods.comment: Get the location for the source file for the plugin.

methods.name: isInCategory
methods.comment: Return whether the plugin is in the given category.

return.comment: true if the plugin is in the category

methods.javadoc: Return the name of the plugin.
methods.name: getName
methods.comment: Return the name of the plugin.

methods.name: getModuleName
methods.comment:
Return the type for the plugin: CORE, CONTRIB, PROTOTYPE, or
 DEVELOP. Within a type, plugins are grouped by category.

return.comment: the type (or null if there is no module)

methods.javadoc:
Return the class of the plugin.
@return plugin class object
methods.name: getPluginClass
methods.comment: Return the class of the plugin.

methods.javadoc:
Return the description of the plugin.
@return "<None>" if no description was specified
methods.name: getDescription
methods.comment: Return the description of the plugin.

methods.javadoc:
Return the category for the plugin.
@return the category
methods.name: getCategory
methods.comment: Return the category for the plugin.

methods.javadoc: Returns the development status of the plugin.
methods.name: getStatus
methods.comment: Returns the development status of the plugin.

methods.name: createPluginDescription
methods.comment:
Constructs a new PluginDescription for the given plugin class.
 
 Deprecated, use PluginInfo instead.

params.name: status
params.comment: the status, UNSTABLE, STABLE, RELEASED, DEBUG, or EXAMPLE

params.name: pluginPackage
params.comment:
the package to which the plugin belongs (see PluginPackage
        subclasses for examples)

params.name: category
params.comment: the category to which the plugin belongs (see PluginCategoryNames

params.name: shortDescription
params.comment: a brief description of what the plugin does

params.name: description
params.comment: the long description of what the plugin does

methods.name: createPluginDescription
methods.comment:
Constructs a new PluginDescription for the given plugin class.
 
 Deprecated, use PluginInfo instead.

params.name: status
params.comment: the status, UNSTABLE, STABLE, RELEASED, DEBUG, or EXAMPLE

params.name: pluginPackage
params.comment:
the package to which the plugin belongs (see PluginPackage
        subclasses for examples)

params.name: category
params.comment: the category to which the plugin belongs (see PluginCategoryNames

params.name: shortDescription
params.comment: a brief description of what the plugin does

params.name: description
params.comment: the long description of what the plugin does

params.name: isSlowInstallation
params.comment: true signals that this plugin loads slowly

methods.name: createPluginDescription
methods.comment: Creates a new PluginDescription for the specified Plugin class.

methods.name: createPluginDescriptionFromAnnotation
methods.comment:
Creates a PluginDescription using information gathered from annotations
 present on the specified Plugin's class.

return.comment: new PluginDescription or null if no annotation info available

methods.name: createDefaultPluginDescription
methods.comment: Creates an empty place-holder PluginDescription for the specified class.

name: PluginDescription
comment:
Class to hold meta information about a plugin, derived from meta-data attached to
 each Plugin using a PluginInfo annotation.
